name: DTIFit
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: DTIFit, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: DTIFit).

inputs.name: Base name
inputs.description: A unicode string. Base_name that all output files will start with.

inputs.name: Bvals
inputs.description: An existing file name. B values file.

inputs.name: Bvecs
inputs.description: An existing file name. B vectors file.

inputs.name: Cni
inputs.description: An existing file name. Input confound regressors.

inputs.name: Dwi
inputs.description: An existing file name. Diffusion weighted image data file.

inputs.name: Gradnonlin
inputs.description: An existing file name. Gradient non linearities.

inputs.name: Little bit
inputs.description: A boolean. Only process small area of brain.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Bet binary mask file.

inputs.name: Max x
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Max x.

inputs.name: Max y
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Max y.

inputs.name: Max z
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Max z.

inputs.name: Min x
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Min x.

inputs.name: Min y
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Min y.

inputs.name: Min z
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Min z.

inputs.name: Save tensor
inputs.description: A boolean. Save the elements of the tensor.

inputs.name: Sse
inputs.description: A boolean. Output sum of squared errors.

output-files.name: Fa
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the fractional anisotropy.

output-files.name: L1
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 1st eigenvalue.

output-files.name: L2
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 2nd eigenvalue.

output-files.name: L3
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 3rd eigenvalue.

output-files.name: Md
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the mean diffusivity.

output-files.name: Mo
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the mode of anisotropy.

output-files.name: S0
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the raw t2 signal with no diffusion weighting.

output-files.name: V1
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 1st eigenvector.

output-files.name: V2
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 2nd eigenvector.

output-files.name: V3
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 3rd eigenvector.

output-files.name: Sse
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the summed squared error.

output-files.name: Tensor
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of file with the 4d tensor volume.
